member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.ASFController.ASFGet
member.summary: Fetches common info related to ASF as a whole.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.ASFController.ASFPost(ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.ASFRequest)
member.summary: Updates ASF's global config.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.ASFController.ExitPost
member.summary: Makes ASF shutdown itself.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.ASFController.RestartPost
member.summary: Makes ASF restart itself.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.ASFController.UpdatePost
member.summary: Makes ASF update itself.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.BotDelete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes all files related to given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.BotGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches common info related to given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.BotPost(System.String,ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRequest)
member.summary: Updates bot config of given bot.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.GamesToRedeemInBackgroundDelete(System.String)
member.summary: Removes BGR output files of given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.GamesToRedeemInBackgroundGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches BGR output files of given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.GamesToRedeemInBackgroundPost(System.String,ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotGamesToRedeemInBackgroundRequest)
member.summary: Adds keys to redeem using BGR to given bot.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.PausePost(System.String,ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotPauseRequest)
member.summary: Pauses given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.RedeemPost(System.String,ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRedeemRequest)
member.summary: Redeems cd-keys on given bot.
member.remarks: Response contains a map that maps each provided cd-key to its redeem result. Redeem result can be a null value, this means that ASF didn't even attempt to send a request (e.g. because of bot not being connected to Steam network).

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.RenamePost(System.String,ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRenameRequest)
member.summary: Renames given bot along with all its related files.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.ResumePost(System.String)
member.summary: Resumes given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.StartPost(System.String)
member.summary: Starts given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.StopPost(System.String)
member.summary: Stops given bots.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.TwoFactorAuthenticationConfirmationsAcceptPost(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts 2FA confirmations of given bots, requires ASF 2FA module to be active on them.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.TwoFactorAuthenticationConfirmationsCancelPost(System.String)
member.summary: Denies 2FA confirmations of given bots, requires ASF 2FA module to be active on them.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.BotController.TwoFactorAuthenticationTokenGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches 2FA tokens of given bots, requires ASF 2FA module to be active on them.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.CommandController.CommandPost(ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.CommandRequest)
member.summary: Executes a command.
member.remarks: This API endpoint is supposed to be entirely replaced by ASF actions available under /Api/ASF/{action} and /Api/Bot/{bot}/{action}. You should use "given bot" commands when executing this endpoint, omitting targets of the command will cause the command to be executed on first defined bot

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.NLogController.NLogGet
member.summary: Fetches ASF log in realtime.
member.remarks: This API endpoint requires a websocket connection.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.StructureController.StructureGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches structure of given type.
member.remarks: Structure is defined as a representation of given object in its default state.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.TypeController.TypeGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches type info of given type.
member.remarks: Type info is defined as a representation of given object with its fields and properties being assigned to a string value that defines their type.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.WWWController.DirectoryGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches files in given directory relative to WWW root.
member.remarks: This is internal API being utilizied by our ASF-ui IPC frontend. You should not depend on existence of any /Api/WWW endpoints as they can disappear and change anytime.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.WWWController.GitHubReleaseGet
member.summary: Fetches the most recent GitHub release of ASF project.
member.remarks: This is internal API being utilizied by our ASF-ui IPC frontend. You should not depend on existence of any /Api/WWW endpoints as they can disappear and change anytime.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.WWWController.GitHubReleaseGet(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches specific GitHub release of ASF project. Use "latest" for latest stable release.
member.remarks: This is internal API being utilizied by our ASF-ui IPC frontend. You should not depend on existence of any /Api/WWW endpoints as they can disappear and change anytime.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Controllers.Api.WWWController.SendPost(ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.WWWSendRequest)
member.summary: Sends a HTTPS request through ASF's built-in HttpClient.
member.remarks: This is internal API being utilizied by our ASF-ui IPC frontend. You should not depend on existence of any /Api/WWW endpoints as they can disappear and change anytime.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.ASFRequest.GlobalConfig
member.summary: ASF's global config structure.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotGamesToRedeemInBackgroundRequest.GamesToRedeemInBackground
member.summary: A string-string map that maps cd-key to redeem (key) to its name (value).
member.remarks: Key in the map must be a valid and unique Steam cd-key. Value in the map must be a non-null and non-empty name of the key (e.g. game's name, but can be anything).

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotPauseRequest.Permanent
member.summary: Specifies if pause is permanent or temporary (default).

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotPauseRequest.ResumeInSeconds
member.summary: Specifies automatic resume action in given seconds. Default value of 0 disables automatic resume.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRedeemRequest.KeysToRedeem
member.summary: A collection (set) of keys to redeem.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRenameRequest.NewName
member.summary: Specifies the new name for the bot. The new name can't be "ASF", neither the one used by any existing bot.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.BotRequest.BotConfig
member.summary: ASF's bot config structure.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.CommandRequest.Command
member.summary: Specifies the command that will be executed by ASF.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Requests.WWWSendRequest.URL
member.summary: Full URL of the request to be made.
member.remarks: URL must start from https:// scheme.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.ASFResponse.BuildVariant
member.summary: ASF's build variant.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.ASFResponse.GlobalConfig
member.summary: Currently loaded ASF's global config.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.ASFResponse.MemoryUsage
member.summary: Current amount of managed memory being used by the process, in kilobytes.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.ASFResponse.ProcessStartTime
member.summary: Start date of the process.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.ASFResponse.Version
member.summary: ASF version of currently running binary.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GamesToRedeemInBackgroundResponse.UnusedKeys
member.summary: Keys that were redeemed and not used during the process, if available.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GamesToRedeemInBackgroundResponse.UsedKeys
member.summary: Keys that were redeemed and used during the process, if available.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GenericResponse`1.Result
member.summary: The actual result of the request, if available.
member.remarks: The type of the result depends on the API endpoint that you've called.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GenericResponse.Message
member.summary: A message that describes what happened with the request, if available.
member.remarks: This property will provide exact reason for majority of expected failures.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GenericResponse.Success
member.summary: Boolean type that specifies if the request has succeeded.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GitHubReleaseResponse.ChangelogHTML
member.summary: Changelog of the release rendered in HTML.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GitHubReleaseResponse.ReleasedAt
member.summary: Date of the release.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GitHubReleaseResponse.Stable
member.summary: Boolean value that specifies whether the build is stable or not (pre-release).

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.GitHubReleaseResponse.Version
member.summary: Version of the release.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.TypeResponse.Body
member.summary: A string-string map representing a decomposition of given type.
member.remarks: The actual structure of this field depends on the type that was requested. You can determine that type based on metadata. For enums, keys are friendly names while values are underlying values of those names. For objects, keys are non-private fields and properties, while values are underlying types of those.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.TypeResponse.Properties
member.summary: Metadata of given type.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.TypeResponse.TypeProperties.BaseType
member.summary: Base type of given type, if available.
member.remarks: This can be used for determining how should be interpreted.

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.TypeResponse.TypeProperties.CustomAttributes
member.summary: Custom attributes of given type, if available.
member.remarks: This can be used for determining main enum type if is .

member.name: F:ArchiSteamFarm.IPC.Responses.TypeResponse.TypeProperties.UnderlyingType
member.summary: Underlying type of given type, if available.
member.remarks: This can be used for determining underlying enum type if is .

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IASF.OnASFInit(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken})
member.summary: ASF will call this method right after global config initialization.
member.param: Extra config properties made out of . Can be null if no extra properties are found.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBot.OnBotDestroy(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot)
member.summary: ASF will call this method after removing its own references from it, e.g. after config removal. You should ensure that you'll remove any of your own references to this bot instance in timely manner. Doing so will allow the garbage collector to dispose the bot afterwards, refraining from doing so will create a "memory leak" by keeping the reference alive.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBot.OnBotInit(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot)
member.summary: ASF will call this method after creating the bot object, e.g. after config creation. Bot config is not yet available at this stage. This function will execute only once for every bot object.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotCommand.OnBotCommand(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,System.UInt64,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: ASF will call this method for unrecognized commands.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
64-bit long unsigned integer of steamID executing the command.
Command message in its raw format, stripped of .
Pre-parsed message using standard ASF delimiters.
member.returns: Response to the command, or null/empty (as the task value) if the command isn't handled by this plugin.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotConnection.OnBotDisconnected(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,SteamKit2.EResult)
member.summary: ASF will call this method when bot gets disconnected from Steam network.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
Reason for disconnection, or if the disconnection was initiated by ASF (e.g. as a result of a command).

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotConnection.OnBotLoggedOn(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot)
member.summary: ASF will call this method when bot successfully connects to Steam network.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotFriendRequest.OnBotFriendRequest(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,System.UInt64)
member.summary: ASF will call this method for unhandled (ignored and rejected) friend requests and Steam group invites received by the bot.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
64-bit Steam identificator of the user that sent a friend request, or a group that the bot has been invited to.
member.returns: True if the request should be accepted as part of this plugin, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotMessage.OnBotMessage(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,System.UInt64,System.String)
member.summary: ASF will call this method for messages that are not commands, so ones that do not start from .
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
64-bit long unsigned integer of steamID executing the command.
Message in its raw format.
member.returns: Response to the message, or null/empty (as the task value) for silence.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotModules.OnBotInitModules(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken})
member.summary: ASF will call this method right after bot config initialization.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
Extra config properties made out of . Can be null if no extra properties are found.

member.name: P:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotsComparer.BotsComparer
member.summary: ASF will use this property for determining the comparer for the bots. Unless you know what you're doing, you should not implement this property yourself and let ASF decide.
member.returns: Comparer that will be used for the bots, as well as bot regexes.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotSteamClient.OnBotSteamCallbacksInit(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,SteamKit2.CallbackManager)
member.summary: ASF will call this method right after custom SK2 client handler initialization in order to allow you listening for callbacks in your own code.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
Callback manager object which can be used for establishing subscriptions to standard and custom callbacks.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotSteamClient.OnBotSteamHandlersInit(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot)
member.summary: ASF will call this method right after bot initialization in order to allow you hooking custom SK2 client handlers into the SteamClient.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
member.returns: Collection of custom client handlers that are supposed to be hooked into the SteamClient by ASF. If you do not require any, just return null.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotTradeOffer.OnBotTradeOffer(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,ArchiSteamFarm.Json.Steam.TradeOffer)
member.summary: ASF will call this method for unhandled (ignored and rejected) trade offers received by the bot.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
Trade offer related to this callback.
member.returns: True if the trade offer should be accepted as part of this plugin, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IBotTradeOfferResults.OnBotTradeOfferResults(ArchiSteamFarm.Bot,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{ArchiSteamFarm.Trading.ParseTradeResult})
member.summary: ASF will call this method for notifying you about the result of each received trade offer being handled. The method is executed for each batch that can contain 1 or more trade offers.
member.param: Bot object related to this callback.
Trade results related to this callback.

member.name: P:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IPlugin.Name
member.summary: ASF will use this property as general plugin identifier for the user.
member.returns: String that will be used as the name of this plugin.

member.name: P:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IPlugin.Version
member.summary: ASF will use this property as version indicator of your plugin to the user. You have a freedom in deciding what versioning you want to use, this is for identification purposes only.
member.returns: Version that will be shown to the user when plugin is loaded.

member.name: M:ArchiSteamFarm.Plugins.IPlugin.OnLoaded
member.summary: ASF will call this method right after plugin initialization.
